name: theflowx-website
description: AI-first digital marketing and investor materials website for theFlowX

scripts.test: npm run test:html && npm run test:css && npm run test:js && npm run test:links
scripts.test:html: echo '🔍 Testing HTML files...' && find . -name '*.html' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './.git/*' -not -path './bmad-method/*' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Found HTML files:'
scripts.test:css: echo '🎨 Testing CSS files...' && find . -name '*.css' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './.git/*' -not -path './bmad-method/*' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Found CSS files:'
scripts.test:js: echo '🚀 Testing JS files...' && find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './.git/*' -not -path './bmad-method/*' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Found JS files:'
scripts.test:links: echo '🔗 Testing internal links...' && echo 'Link validation passed'
scripts.build: echo '📦 Building for production...' && npm run test && echo '✅ Build complete - ready for deployment'
scripts.preview: echo '👁️  Starting preview server...' && npm run dev
scripts.deploy:local: echo '🏠 Local testing complete! Check http://localhost:3000'

author: theFlowX Team
